summary: Tired of seeing my bolts travelling on my back.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod because I started using the crossbow and I was disappointed by the quiver strolling through my back and its distance from the body when crouched.

I tried several methods to fix the bug but I had various glitches that I could not bring myself.

Finally I find a sort of solution when i see the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5711/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D5711&pUp=1]Closer Bolts - Closer and Hidden Crossbow Bolts[/url] from [b]EvilDeadAsh34[/b]. 

So I edited the skeleton.nif to create a new node for a special garment called "Bolt Quiver" in game and open the steelbolt.nif and dwarvenbolt.nif to remove the quiver and rework the arrow.

This mod hide the "real" bolt quiver and add a special garment that you can make at the forge in the misc section.

Now the quiver is closer to your body and don't go far away when you crouch.

Installation:

Requires Dawnguard
As usual, copy the content in your Data folder.

Incompatibilty:

Unfortunately this mod is incompatible with custom skeleton but this can be easily fixed with nifskope.
